key.name: active
key.summary: Stores the last state of the indicator
key.description: Whether the sleep prevention was enabled or not

key.name: ac-type
key.summary: Stores the last state of the sleep-inactive-ac-type setting

key.name: bat-type
key.summary: Stores the last state of the sleep-inactive-battery-type setting

key.name: dim-on-idle
key.summary: Stores the last state of the idle-dim setting

key.name: session-timeout
key.summary: Stores the last state of the idle-delay setting
